Text.val: 06.11.2008 AS SCR14085 additional parameter GM102 pi.batch_processing

SQL_STMT_U.val:
select INVO.INVO_INVOICENO, INVO.INVO_INVDATE, INVO.INVO_AACTUALH, INVO.INVO_TEXT, DEBC.DEBC_ADMNO, DEBC.DEBC_CLNTNO, DEBC.DEBC_DEBC, DEBC.DEBC_DEBH, DEBC.DEBC_COUNTRY, DEBC.DEBC_ADDRESS, DEBC.DEBC_NAME, CLNT.CLNT316_DEBTORAPPROACHABLE, COFF.COFF206_EMPLOYEEINVOICE
from :1/INVO INVO INNER JOIN :1/CLNT CLNT ON INVO.INVO_ADMNO = CLNT.CLNT101_ADMNO and INVO.INVO_CLNTNO = CLNT.CLNT102_CLNTNO INNER JOIN :1/DEBH DEBH ON INVO.INVO_DEBH_NO = DEBH.DEBH_NO INNER JOIN :1/DEBC DEBC ON INVO.INVO_DEBC_NO = DEBC.DEBC_NO INNER JOIN :1/CCRY CCRY ON CLNT.CLNT101_ADMNO = CCRY.CCRY308_ADMNO and CLNT.CLNT102_CLNTNO = CCRY.CCRY308_CLNTNO and (DEBC.DEBC_ADDRESS <> '' and DEBC.DEBC_COUNTRY = CCRY.CCRY308_COUNTRY or DEBC.DEBC_ADDRESS = '' and DEBH.DEBH_HADR_COUNTRY = CCRY.CCRY308_COUNTRY) INNER JOIN :1/COFF COFF ON INVO.INVO_ADMNO = COFF.COFF_ADMNO and INVO.INVO_CLNTNO = COFF.COFF_CLNTNO and CCRY.CCRY308_OFFICE = COFF.COFF_CODE INNER JOIN :1/HUSR HUSR ON COFF.COFF206_EMPLOYEEINVOICE = HUSR.HUSR_ID where (SUBSTRING(INVO.INVO_INVOICENO,1,7) = 'NOGOVER' or SUBSTRING(INVO.INVO_INVOICENO,1,6) = 'TOBEAS' or SUBSTRING(INVO.INVO_INVOICENO,1,5) = 'CEDER') and (INVO.INVO_AACTUALI <> 0) and (INVO.INVO_ADMNO :2) and (CLNT.CLNT906_STATUSCONTRACT = 1) and (HUSR.HUSR_HOFF_CODE = ':3') order by COFF.COFF206_EMPLOYEEINVOICE, DEBC.DEBC_ADMNO, DEBC.DEBC_CLNTNO

ExpSyntax.val: IF ({1,3}=0,'in (select ADMN.ADMN_NO from '&Trim ({32768,9})&'/ADMN ADMN where ADMN.ADMN_DELCREDERE = '&ASCIIChr (39)&'N'&ASCIIChr (39)&' and ADMN.ADMN_ENDCLIENTS = '&ASCIIChr (39)&'N'&ASCIIChr (39)&')','= '&Str ({1,3},'4'))
